originalText.text: I tried a couple places before finding Paws Gurus to have my 95 lbs. Great Pyrenees mix groomed, and Paws is by far the BEST! They do an incredible job every time and then when I pick him up give me details about how he did, any areas that seemed sensitive, etc. They do a great job deshedding for an incredibly high-shedding breed, they do his nails, brush his teeth and trim his coat. I always recommend them to friends at the park who ask and highly recommend to anyone, especially people with long haired breeds that are a bit more difficult to groom!

originalText.text:
The Paws Gurus is by far the best dog daycare I have used in NYC, I have used many because of moving. They are extremely responsive and easy to reach. They normally have availability and have flexible hours. While my dog is there I can see videos of him playing from looking at their social media, I love this because it allows me to check in for long trips! I know when my dog comes here he is well taken care of! They are just simply the best!!!

I have used their pick up service, day care, and night hotel. All of which are absolutely amazing!

originalText.text: I've had great experiences with this place. I've boarded my dog here for a few nights at a time when I've had to travel and couldn't arrange a sitter. The owner, Vera, is great. She spends time with and knows all the dogs personally and has been very communicative by email when I've had questions or needed to make special arrangements. She uploads videos of the dogs on their Instagram, so you can check in on them, which is great for peace of mind. The dogs aren't in crates or caged, they get to spend all day roaming free in a big open room, and also get a chance to run around outside in their enclosed yard. In order to leave your dog there for daycare or boarding, your dog has to pass a trial first, to ensure they're properly socialized, which also gives peace of mind that your dog's not going to get into fights when they're there. I've also had good experiences getting my dog groomed here (see the pictures for before and after). Highly recommend!

originalText.text: My Furbaby Venice absolutely loves her time at The Paws Guru. Her groomer is attentive and gentle. Such excellent care! She's always a little anxious before arriving, but then she's excited and tail's wagging. Isn't she Pretty?

originalText.text: This place is excellent! They treat my puppy with love.  I know that he gets groomed there with the utmost care.  He also has many fun day care days.  It is very clean and responsible.
